name: NES-Pong
description:
A Pong clone made using 6502 assembly and assembled using the ca65 assembler.

This is my first NES homebrew game, and is slightly stripped down - ie no music/sounds as of yet - but is still pretty cool to have been able to make.

To play all you really need to do is download an NES emulator - I use Mesen- and then open up the .nes file with you emulator, then set up 2 controllers in the emulator, or use your keyboard, and play!
